item.title: Throwing knifes how do i add them? im using delta source
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

You’re probably going to add the knife to the bow list so it’ll behave as a bow actually using arrows.

item.description:
@iwolfi wrote:

nothing happened when i added gfx and i wont far range this is my gfx code i put it in arrowgfx

[code]public int getarrowgfxnow() {

if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4740) {
return 28;
}

   		if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892) {
      		return 15;
   		} 
   		if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890) {
      		return 13;
    	} 
    	if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888) {
        		return 12;
    	} 
    	if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886) {
        		return 11;
    	} 
    	if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884) {
        		return 9;
    	} 
    	if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882) {
        		return 10;
            }
            if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 863) {
        		return 219;
            
            
    	} else { return 250; }
}[/code]

219-225 = throwing knives graphics
232-237 = throwing darts graphics
